content.text: The Babbs were a sentient species that were small in stature. Consequently, they were occasionally thought of in contrast to Wookiees. In 26 BBY, a number of Babbs were present on the planet Euceron, which was hosting the Galactic Games, and they were seen by the Jedi Padawan Anakin Skywalker on a landing pad.
The Babbs were created by Jude Watson for the young adult novel Jedi Quest: The Dangerous Games, published by Scholastic in 2002.
